articles.author: Christine Hall
articles.title: Google Cloud Next 2024: Everything announced so far - TechCrunch
articles.description: Don’t have time to be in Las Vegas? That’s OK: We’ve summed up the most important parts of this year's Google Cloud Next.
articles.content: Googles Cloud Next 2024 event takes place in Las Vegas through Thursday, and that means lots of new cloud-focused news on everything from Gemini, Googles AI-powered chatbot, to AI to devops and secur… [+8666 chars]

articles.title: Romeo & Juliet: Hundreds show support for actress abused online - BBC.com
articles.description: Francesca Amewudah-Rivers has been trolled online with "racist and misogynistic abuse" after casting.

articles.title: CERN pays tribute to Peter Higgs - CERN
articles.description: Peter Higgs has passed away at the age of 94. An iconic figure in modern science, Higgs in 1964 postulated the existence of the eponymous Higgs boson. Its discovery at CERN in 2012 was the crowning achievement of the Standard Model (SM) of particle physics – …
